reference.title: cxxEnumerationDeclarationFile
reference.shortdesc: Specifies the file in which the enum declaration is present.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxEnumerationDeclarationFile> element is defined within <cxxEnumerationAPIItemLocation>. The only content of the element <cxxEnumerationDeclarationFile> is the required attributes name and value. name is always "filePath" and value is the actual file path.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <cxxEnumerationAPIItemLocation> <cxxEnumerationDeclarationFile name="filePath" value="C:/src/include/gdi.h"/> <cxxEnumerationDeclarationFileLineStart name="lineNumber" value="1719"/> <cxxEnumerationDeclarationFileLineEnd name="lineNumber" value="1727"/> </cxxEnumerationAPIItemLocation>
